DOC.HEADLINE: THE WEEK AHEAD : BLOEMFONTEIN ; ANC TAKING_STOCK
DOC.TEXT: Led by President Nelson Mandela , about 3 # 000 delegates from South_Africa ' s ruling African National Congress , the black liberation movement-turned-political party , will meet Saturday through Wednesday to discuss how far they have come and the challenges that lie ahead in their country . The 49th national conference will take_place in Bloemfontein , where the ANC was founded in 1912 . The city , capital of the old Orange Free_State , later became a stronghold of the right-wing white Afrikaners who institutionalized racial_segregation under apartheid . The theme of the conference will be " From Resistance to Reconstruction and Nation-Building. " Despite reports of a leadership struggle , Cyril Ramaphosa is expected to win easy reelection as secretary_general .
